wikipedia_page.main: Rafal Edward Dunin-Borkowski (born 3 August 1969) is a British experimental physicist.  He is currently Director of the Institute for Microstructure Research (PGI-5) and the Ernst Ruska-Centre for Microscopy and Spectroscopy with Electrons (ER-C) in Forschungszentrum Jülich and Professor of Experimental Physics in RWTH Aachen University.

response: * Rafal E. Dunin-Borkowski (born 1969), director of the Ernst Ruska-Centre for Microscopy and Spectroscopy with Electrons (ER-C) in Forschungszentrum Jülich.
* Rafal E. Dunin-Borkowski (born 1969), British experimental physicist
* Rafal E. Dunin-Borkowski (2000-2007), University of Cambridge
